properties.name: Abbey Road Studios
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken  3 Abbey Road, St Johns Wood, London, NW8 9AYThe infamous road where The Beatles recorded and featured on their Abbey Road Cover released in 1969

properties.name: Birthplace of The Beatles
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken  Where The Beatles came to be

properties.name: Blackburn, Lancashire
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken Mention in the song,A Day in the Life from "Sgt. Pepper\'s Lonely Hearts Club Band" "oh boy Four thousand holes in Blackburn, Lancashire And though the holes were rather small They had to count them all Now, they know how many holes it takes to fill the Albert Hall I\'d love to turn you on"

properties.name: Eiffel Tower
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken  Paris, FranceRandom shot out to one of Paris\' most recognizable landmarks, it made an appearance in 1967\'s I am the Walrus. It is off the group\'s album Magical Mystery Tour "Sitting in an English garden waiting for the sun If the sun don\'t shine you get you\'re tan from standing in the English rain Semolina Pilchard climbing up the Eiffel tower"

properties.name: Georgia
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken If Ukraine or Moscow girls did not do it in "Back In The U.S.S.R" Girls from Georgia were always on the fab four\'s mind. "And Georgia\'s, Georgia\'s always, always on my mi-mi-mi-mi-mind."

properties.name: Isle of Wight
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken  If you are looking to retire alone or with your lover, The Beatles may have been right in Sgt. Pepper\'s Lonely Hearts Club Band Album, "When I\'m Sixty Four" "Every summer we can rent a cottage, In the Isle of Wight, if it\'s not too dear We shall scrimp and save Grandchildren on your knee Vera, Chuck and Dave"

properties.name: Moscow
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken  Now the capital of Russia, Moscow at the time of The Beatles 1968\' hit "Back In The U.S.S.R" had the Liverpool boys writing about a horrific flight back to the U.S.S.R. from Miami Beach. It is from their "White Album" "Oh the Ukraine girls really knock me out. They leave the West behind. And Moscow girls really sing and shout. And Georgia\'s, Georgia\'s always, always on my mi-mi-mi-mi-mind."

properties.name: Norwegian wood
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken On "Rubber Soul" it is still unknown if The Beatles was referring to wood of Norway or something more? I guess we will never

properties.name: Penny Lane
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken  Maybe a girl, maybe just the street. The mystery is added by the 1967 tune "Penny Lane." It is up to the listener. "Penny Lane is in my ears and in my eyes, there beneath the blue suburban skies I sit and meanwhile back"

properties.name: Royal Albert Hall
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken Kensington Gore, Westminster, London, SW7 2APFamous arts venue in the Knightsbridge area of the City of Westminster Mention in the song. It it referenced in "A Day in the Life" from the album, Sgt. Pepper\'s Lonely Hearts Club Band "They had to count them all Now, they know how many holes it takes to fill the Albert Hall I\'d love to turn you on"

properties.name: Strawberry Fields
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken  306 W. Springfield Avenue Urbana, IllinoisIt is unknown if the grocery store has anything to do with "Strawberry Fields Forever," but its a little too similar.hmmmm

properties.name: Tucson Arizona
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken Jojo may have been a loner, but here sure got out of Tucson Arizona in 1969\'s "Get Back" from Abbey Road. "Jojo was a man who thought he was a loner But he knew it wouldn\'t last. Jojo left his home in Tucson, Arizona For some California grass."

properties.name: Ukraine
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken Although the Beatles\' song, "Back In The U.S.S.R," boosted how lucky one could be,the fab four seem to have fondness for the girls from Ukraine. "Oh the Ukraine girls really knock me out. They leave the West behind."

properties.name: Yellow Submarine Hostel
properties.description: Posted by Mkonopken    Akacfa street 5We may not able be to live in a yellow submarine,but if you ever around Budapest, Hungary you can stay in one, well a hostel. Although the hostel and song have little in common, the site does reference the infamous 1966 to all live in a dream world.
